reviews.review: Very nice game, you can easily learn how to speak russian and how many russians fucked your mother

One of the best in the genre, but it still is a flawed genre by design

It presents itself as a tactical realistic shooter, but in reality, at its core, it's an arcade-y competitive shooter. Suppressive fire is useless, automatic rifles and pistols are just as useful close-range as shotguns

The realistic part comes in the form of RNG. I know TF2 is quite reliant on unpredictable elements, so I don't know if CS:GO uses the random bullet spread to justify realism, or realism to justify the random bullet spread. Either way, with aimpunch, bullet spread and recoil tearing you apart from 3 directions, don't even bother taking the time to aim for the enemy.

Trying to run from cover to cover, you'll find yourself shot for 17 damage from across the map & your character stopping like they forgot their car keys, with no sense of self-preservation, only to be headshot a second later. Urban combat tactics are to be forgotten when playing this game - just get enough people in a sector, spray & pray. And don't bother with shotguns, covering fire or strategic advancing.
Muito bom o jogo, recomendo muito pra quem quer se divertir com amigos. Contêm várias formas de jogo e é muito divertido!!!

Хорошая игра, играю в нее долго.
It's counter-strike, what else do i need to say?

This game is fantastic, and after 500 hours all I have left to work on is: communication, aim, map awareness, crosshair placement, economy management, pistol aim, game sense, AWP flicks, grenade spots, smoke spots, pop flashes, positioning, bomb plant positions, retake ability, spray control, toxicity, anger management, positive attitude, post plant time management, general awareness and getting kills

10/10

Jogo Counter-Strike desde o 1.6, a migração para o CS:GO foi um pouco difícil, porém não tem como não amar esse jogo. <3
Sou completamente apaixonado por este jogo!, porem a Valve abandonou as mudanças que realmente importam pra o jogo, e os cheaters são praticamente liberados, estragando quem joga o jogo sério.

O jogo é um bom jogo mas após tantas horas acabei por me cansar um pouco, mas é apenas o meu gosto visto que tenho amigos com mais de 2000 horas neste próprio jogo. Continuo a jogar o jogo várias vezes por semana, mas já não tenho o vicio de jogar todos os dias que tinha o ano passado...
